page.topic: How to Add Custom Swipe Events to Panels
page.description: Adding swipe gestures to mobile applications can create a better user interface experience for users.

discussion.p: Swipe gestures are commonly found in mobile applications. You can add your own custom swipe events to Panels (Panel Cards, Panel Layouts, and Panel Navigators) using the *[ui:onSwipe]* JavaScript event to create a better user experience in your mobile applications.
